name: h3
description: The 2026 DeMarini Prism+ Drop 11 Fastpitch Softball Bat is engineered for peak performance, featuring a balanced swing feel ideal for slap hitters. Its two-piece composite construction includes a Continuous Fiber Composite Barrel, enhancing strength and consistency. The Gapped Wall Composite technology expands the sweet spot, while the Type V Prism+ Connection optimizes barrel performance for a premium feel. Certified by USSSA 1.20, ASA, NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this bat sports a striking black, purple, and multi-colored design, with a 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter and a Refract End Cap for superior bat speed. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
